name: Xilinx Device Configuration File
summary: Learn about .ISC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In order to communicate with certain hardware, Xilinx may also require other input files, such as a Boundary-Scan Description Language (.BSDL) file and a Xilinx Bitstream (.BIT) file.

description: Settings file that stores configuration information for a Xilinx ISE (Integrated Software Environment) project; used for programming customizable integrated circuits, such as field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs).
